metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2854 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: The aufs module for the Linux kernel 3.x and 4.x does not properly maintainPOSIX ACL xattr data, which allows local users to gain privileges byleveraging a group-writable setgid directory.

criterions.comment: linux-gke-4.15: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
